net.sf.jgcs

Interface Membership


  • public interface Membership
    A group membership configuration. This includes the current members of the group, but also how it differs from the previous configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCoordinatorRank()
      Gets the rank of the coordinator of this group.
      List<SocketAddress> getFailedMembers()
      Gets a list of members that failed since the previous membership.
      List<SocketAddress> getJoinedMembers()
      Gets a list of members that joined the group since the previous membership.
      List<SocketAddress> getLeavedMembers()
      Gets a list of members that leaved the group since the previous membership.
      int getLocalRank()
      Gets the rank of this process in this membership.
      SocketAddress getMemberAddress(int rank)
      Gets the address of the member that has the given rank.
      int getMemberRank(SocketAddress member)
      Gets the member rank that has the given address, or null if there is no matching rank.
      MembershipID getMembershipID()
      Gets the membership identifier
      List<SocketAddress> getMembershipList()
      Gets the list of members in this configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • getMembershipList

        List<SocketAddress> getMembershipList()
        Gets the list of members in this configuration.
        Returns:
        list of members.

      • getMembershipID

        MembershipID getMembershipID()
        Gets the membership identifier
        Returns:
        a membership identifier.

      • getLocalRank

        int getLocalRank()
          throws InvalidStateException
        Gets the rank of this process in this membership.
        Returns:
        the rank of the local process.
        Throws:
        InvalidStateException - if the member is not in a group.

      • getCoordinatorRank

        int getCoordinatorRank()
        Gets the rank of the coordinator of this group. It is guaranteed that all members will get the same reply.
        Returns:
        the rank of the coordinator of the group.

      • getMemberRank

        int getMemberRank(SocketAddress member)
        Gets the member rank that has the given address, or null if there is no matching rank.
        Parameters:
        member - the socket address of the member.
        Returns:
        the rank of the member.

      • getMemberAddress

        SocketAddress getMemberAddress(int rank)
        Gets the address of the member that has the given rank.
        Parameters:
        rank - the rank of the member.
        Returns:
        the socket address of the member.

      • getJoinedMembers

        List<SocketAddress> getJoinedMembers()
        Gets a list of members that joined the group since the previous membership.
        Returns:
        a list of new members or null if there are none.

      • getLeavedMembers

        List<SocketAddress> getLeavedMembers()
        Gets a list of members that leaved the group since the previous membership.
        Returns:
        a list of old members or null if there are none.

      • getFailedMembers

        List<SocketAddress> getFailedMembers()
        Gets a list of members that failed since the previous membership.
        Returns:
        a list of failed members or null if there are none.
